AllTransport.text: Use every possible method of transport

CarFree.text: Chart a course that uses no cars

CarsNS.text: All cars should go more North-South than West-East

CarsWE.text: All cars should go more West-East than North-South

CityStartsWithB.text: Visit a city that starts with B

CityStartsWithF.text: Visit a city that starts with F

CityStartsWithL.text: Visit a city that starts with L

CityStartsWithN.text: Visit a city that starts with N

CityStartsWithP.text: Visit a city that starts with P

CityStartsWithS.text: Visit a city that starts with S

CountryStartsWithB.text: Visit a country that starts with B

CountryStartsWithF.text: Visit a country that starts with F

CountryStartsWithI.text: Visit a country that starts with I

CountryStartsWithL.text: Visit a country that starts with L

CountryStartsWithN.text: Visit a country that starts with N

CountryStartsWithP.text: Visit a country that starts with P

CrossThree.text: Cross the EU / non-EU border at least three times

LeaveEU.text: Visit at least one city outside the EU

MaxEndpointDistance.text: The start and end points are at most 1000km apart.

MaxJourneyDistance.text: Ensure the entire journey is less than 5000km

MaxLat.text: The route should not exceed 10 degrees latitude in spread

MaxLegCost.text: Every leg of the trip must cost under 300 Euros per person

MaxLettersCity.text: Every city must be under 10 letters long

MaxLettersCountry.text: Every country must be under 10 letters long

MaxLon.text: The route should not exceed 15 degrees longitude in spread

MaxOverallCost.text: The trip must cost under 2000 Euros per person

MinEndpointDistance.text: The start and end points are more than 3000km apart.

MinJourneyDistance.text: Ensure the entire journey is beyond 10000km

MinLat.text: The route should exceed 20 degrees latitude in spread

MinLegCost.text: Every leg of the trip must cost at least 100 Euros per person

MinLegDistance.text: Ensure every leg is at least 200km

MinLettersCity.text: Every city must be at least 5 letters long

MinLettersCountry.text: Every country must be at least 6 letters long

MinLon.text: The route should exceed 25 degrees longitude in spread

MinOverallCost.text: The trip must cost over 3000 Euros per person

MinPopulation.text: Ensure every city visited has at least 500k people

MustUseCar.text: Chart a course that uses cars

MustUsePlane.text: Chart a course that uses planes

MustUseSail.text: Chart a course that uses boats

MustUseTrain.text: Chart a course that uses trains

NoCapitals.text: Plan a route that avoids all capital cities

NoCrossThree.text: Don't cross the EU / non-EU border more than twice

NoPathsCrossing.text: Create a route that never crosses over itself

NoThreeLetter.text: Ensure no three cities start with the same letter

OnlyAcute.text: Ensure the route only has acute angles

OnlyObtuse.text: Ensure the route only has obtuse angles

PassThroughDE.text: Get within 200km of any German city without stopping

PassThroughES.text: Get within 200km of any Spanish city without stopping

PassThroughFR.text: Get within 200km of any French city without stopping

PassThroughIT.text: Get within 200km of any Italian city without stopping

PassThroughPL.text: Get within 200km of any Polish city without stopping

PassThroughRU.text: Get within 200km of any Russian city without stopping

PassThroughTR.text: Get within 200km of any Turkish city without stopping

PassThroughUK.text: Get within 200km of any British city without stopping

PathsCrossing.text: Create a route that crosses over itself

PlaneFree.text: Chart a course that uses no planes

PlanesNS.text: All planes should go more North-South than West-East

PlanesWE.text: All planes should go more West-East than North-South

SailFree.text: Chart a course that uses no boats

SomeCapitals.text: Plan a route that goes to at least one capital city

SomeSmallPopulation.text: Visit at least one city with under 500k population

StartEndMaxLat.text: The route endpoints should not exceed 10 degrees latitude in spread

StartEndMaxLon.text: The route endpoints should not exceed 15 degrees longitude in spread

StartEndMinLat.text: The route endpoints should exceed 20 degrees latitude in spread

StartEndMinLon.text: The route endpoints should exceed 25 degrees longitude in spread

StayAwayDE.text: Don't get within 200km of any German city

StayAwayES.text: Don't get within 200km of any Spanish city

StayAwayFR.text: Don't get within 200km of any French city

StayAwayIT.text: Don't get within 200km of any Italian city

StayAwayPL.text: Don't get within 200km of any Polish city

StayAwayRU.text: Don't get within 200km of any Russian city

StayAwayTR.text: Don't get within 200km of any Turkish city

StayAwayUK.text: Don't get within 200km of any British city

StayInEU.text: Don't visit any city outside the EU

ThreeLetter.text: Go to at least three cities starting with the same letter

TrainFree.text: Chart a course that uses no trains

TrainsNS.text: All trains should go more North-South than West-East

TrainsWE.text: All trains should go more West-East than North-South

UniqueCityLetters.text: Every city must start with a different letter

UniqueCountryLetters.text: Every country must start with a different letter
